name: A Place to Call
description:
Home means a different thing to all of us. Might not be what you want but you try to make do.

This is a game made in 4 weeks based on the premise of home, Instead of looking at what home is to me, I looked into a different way.

You play as a homeless person entering an abandon home to take shelter for the night looking to keep warm and comfortable. What was once someones home will now be your home for the night. Your home is what you make it.

Those involved:

Adam Crompton - Check me out.

Aiden Krummel - Check them out.

Anthony Farruggio - Check them out.

Caleb Barton - Check them out.

Josh Hoare - Check them out.

Teyden Pearl,
